Check to set the voice role separately a: Check to set voice role below
Chinese/Japanese/Korean line length: If the number of characters in a single line of Chinese, Japanese, or Korean subtitles exceeds the limit, a line break will be created. This only applies to the target subtitle.
Choose at least one for audio and video: Select at least one A/V source
Click on Set Home Directory to save the: Set Home Dir for all output files
Currently Faster-Whisper-XXL cannot be u: Faster-Whisper-XXL N/A in package. Use source or separate app.
Customize each configuration to batch vi: Batch config. Pause to edit subs if single video.
Do not include files with the same name: Duplicate names with diff extensions forbidden: {}
Has been connected to the text model tra: Connected: LLM Subs, ASR, OpenAI/Doubao/Azure/Minimax/Dubbingx Voices

GPU<12G avoid Large models.
Use .en models for English video only.

Local LLM API url: LLM API URL (Add /v1 manually if needed)
Modify the translation result and save i: Pause to edit translation (Single file only)
Must be a paid account, free account fre: Paid account required (Free tier too slow)
No need to fill in the official interfac: Official: Blank. 3rd Party DeepL: Fill URL
No speech was detected, please make sure: No speech detected. Check audio & language.
Number of characters per line for subtit: If the number of characters in a single line of subtitles in other languages exceeds the limit, a line break will be created. This only applies to the target subtitle.
Overall recognition is suitable for vide: Overall: Good for videos with silence/BGM.
Please make sure that the audio file {}: Ensure audio {} exists in chatterbox folder
Preset role {} is incorrectly configured: Role {} Config Error: Missing Ref Audio
Speaker classification language: Only supports Chinese and English voice.
Starting from version 3.68 of this softw: v3.68+: Supports official WebUI only (F5/Spart/Index/Dia/VoxCPM). No 3rd-party packages/APIs.

Thank all donators, Click to view the li: Thanks to all donators! Click to view list.
The current directory {} is not writabl: Dir {} not writable. Move app or run as Admin.
The network proxy address you fill in se: Invalid Proxy? Format: http://127.0.0.1:port. Do not fill if unsure. API URLs go in Settings. Click Yes to continue if sure.
The original file {} does not contain an: File {} invalid (No A/V data). Check file.
The reference audio path name and the te: Ref Audio Path & Text required in Settings
There is no time/startraw/start_time in: No valid timestamps found in subs
There is no valid audio in the file {} a: No valid audio in {}. Check file.
re-segment the sentence.the original seg:
LLM re-segmentation must use the most advanced online AI; otherwise, the default segmentation is no better.
Automatic correction should be used to re-segment the sentences using a simple local algorithm.

bixutianxiecloneapi: Clone-voice requires deployment & API URL in Settings
cudatips: Enable CUDA if NVIDIA GPU available (Faster)
deepl_authkey: DeepL Auth Key required in Settings
enmodelerror: distil/.en models are for English Audio only
fenge_tips:
Overall: Better accuracy.
Batch: Faster but less accurate splits.
jimiaohoufanyi: Countdown: Auto-close. Stop to edit. Save to continue.
llmduanju: LLM Resegment: Set OpenAI Model/Key in Settings.
llmduanjudp: LLM Resegment: Set DeepSeek Model/Key in Settings.
model_type_tips:
Faster: Fast/Efficient (Needs CUDA+cuDNN)
OpenAI: Slower/Heavy (Needs CUDA only)
nocuda: No CUDA detected. Check NVIDIA GPU/Drivers. See Help -> CUDA.
nocudnn: cuDNN missing. Check install guide or use OpenAI model.
shuoming01:
Click to preview voice.
Wait a few seconds.
shuoming02:
Hard Subs: Burned in (Permanent).
Soft Subs: Toggleable.
shuoming03: Sync issues occur due to language diffs. Adjust speed/rate.
subtitle_tips: Edit subs here or drag SRT file
tiquzimu: Source: Video Lang. Target: Desired Lang.
tuodonghuoshuru: Type text or Drag SRT here
zimubianjitishi: Edit subs here for better accuracy
{lang} represents the target language na: {lang} is target lang name. Keep it.
From tiny model to base to small to medi: Models (Tiny -> Large-v3): Size/Quality increases, Speed decreases. Default: Tiny. Use .en/distil for English only.
Please fill in one line at a time, follo: Please fill in the blanks line by line, following the original language terms on the left and the translations on the right. For example: CEO = 首席执行官
Prompt: Please open the {} file directly:
Send Full Subtitles is selected is: [Software Directory/videotrans/prompts/srt/{}.txt]
The prompt message when it is not selected is: [Software Directory/videotrans/prompts/text/{}.txt]
Place the reference audio in the chatter: Place audio in 'chatterbox' folder. Fill filename (e.g. 123.mp3),One per line
elevenlabs toggle role: ElevenLabs: Switch channel & back to refresh roles
The current language does not support au: Audition not supported for this language
If you confirm to clean up, all files in: Warning: Deletes matching folders in Output Dir. Ensure no important data in [{}] before proceeding.
The output directory is not allowed to p: Output Dir cannot be Input Dir. Use default or new folder.
This window will automatically close aft: This window will close automatically after the countdown ends. If no changes are needed, click the save button at the bottom to continue.
Speaker: Speaker
If the selected channel supports speaker: Insert speaker ID at start of subs (if supported)
DownloadRealTimeModel:
Model URL copied. Download & extract to [{}].
If blocked, try: https://pvt9.com/zh/getmodel
assign a specific voice to a line of sub: Assign specific voice to line (High Priority)
Automatic correction ing: Subtitles are being automatically corrected, please wait....
Automatic subtitle correction: If selected, excessively long or short subtitles will be split and merged.
The subtitle editing interface is render: The subtitle editing interface is rendering, please wait...
Data is ready rendering is in progress: Data is ready rendering is in progress
You can check the voiceover here, or mod: You can check the voiceover here, or modify the text and re-encode the voiceover. Please stop the countdown before proceeding
To remove a voiceover, simply clear the:
To remove a voiceover, simply clear the text. A voiceover duration of 0 seconds indicates a failed voiceover
Click the + and - symbols to move the start and end times of the subtitles.
The text can modified and dubbing can re: The text can modified and dubbing can re-dubbed
The audio file does not exist: The audio file does not exist
Double-click the text box to edit the su: Double-click the text box to edit the subtitles
Click the + or - symbols to move the sta: Click the + or - button to increase or decrease the start time of this subtitle by 0.1 seconds.
Click the + or - symbols to move the end: Click the + or - button to increase or decrease the end time of this subtitle by 0.1 seconds.
It cannot overlap with the timing of the: It cannot overlap with the timing of the preceding and following subtitles
End time cannot be less than Start time: End time cannot be less than Start time
Start time cannot exceed End time: Start time cannot exceed End time
Shortened and Exceeded mean: [Exceeded] means the dubbed version is longer than the original audio; [Shortened] means the dubbed version is shorter than the original audio.
whisperx-tips:
Please deploy and start the whisperx-api project, and enter http://127.0.0.1:9092 in the API address box. 
For detailed installation and usage instructions, please click the Help/Tutorials button to view. 
Whisperx-api project address: https://github.com/jianchang512/whisperx-api
only_out_mp4: By default, will output intermediate materials such as SRT/audio files; selecting this option will output only MP4 files.
model is missing. Please download it: The download link for the TTS model has been copied to your clipboard. Please paste it into your browser's address bar to download. After downloading, extract the files. You will see 1 folder. Copy it to the directory specified in {}.
win-forbid-name: In Windows, filenames are not allowed to use the symbols {}. Some download tools may create filenames that do not conform to Windows rules. Please modify them and try again.
This model only supports speech transcri: This speech recognition model only supports speech transcription of the following languages:
cosyvoice23webui: Using this interface requires launching the webui.py file of the official CosyVoice2/3 project. CosyVoice3 cannot directly use the official webui.py file to interface with this software. Click the Fill in Tutorial  button in the lower right corner to see the solution.
downloading all files:
If the model download failed, 
you can try opening the following URL and downloading all files to the
 {} folder.
Restoring punctuation marks when Chinese: Restoring punctuation marks when Chinese & English
Secondary speech recognition of dubbing: Subtitles are created again from the voice-over file using speech recognition; this only takes effect when a voice-over has been selected and non double subtitles embed.
bubaocunshuoming:
If you have manually or used other tools to modify the
[{}] subtitle files in the subtitle folder, please click this button.
may be insufficient memory: An error has occurred. There may be insufficient memory or video memory. Please try changing the faster-whisper batch size to 1 in the advanced options.
Batch dubbing of SRT or TXT subtitle fil: Batch dubbing of SRT or TXT subtitle files
conflict with the role specified by row: If you want to assign a character to a specific subtitle without being restricted by the speaker's role, please make sure to do this last.
will be automatically identified as the: If the subtitle begins with [xxx],example [spk1],[speaker2]eg., it will be automatically identified as the speaker
check the custom voice model CustomeVoic: The built-in voice is currently being used: {}, but the model launched by Qwen-TTS is not a custom voice model. Please check the custom voice model CustomeVoice used to launch Qwen-TTS, or please select to clone the character or use the reference audio for dubbing.
Please check the voice clone model Base: The currently used voice is {}, but the model launched by Qwen-TTS is not a voice clone model. Please check the voice clone model Base that launched Qwen-TTS, or please select a built-in voice for dubbing.
If not specified separately: If not specified separately, the default role set on the main interface will be used
Right-click: Menu | << >> : Adjust time: Right-clicking on the table cell displays an operation menu (increase/decrease time, preview, re-dub).
Double-click: +0.1s | Right-click: adjus: Double-click to add 0.1s, right-click to customize.
Double-click: -0.1s | Right-click: adjus: Double-click to subtract 0.1s, right-click to customize.
Enter milliseconds (positive or negative: Enter positive or negative millisecond values ​​to increase or decrease time; 1 second = 1000 milliseconds.
